titles: The judge's authority or constitution a sermon preached in the Cathedral Church of St. Peter in York, upon Monday the 7th day of March 1669/70, at the assizes holden for that county before the Right Honourable Baron Littleton, the Right WOrshipfull Sr. Philip Monckton, Knight, being High-sheriff of Yorkshire / by James Johnson ...
author: Johnson, James, 1639 or 40-1704.
publisher: Printed by John Hayes ..., for Samuel Simpson ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
